forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Drizzle
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after 2am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
This afternoon in Downtown San Francisco, the air is crisp under an inviting sun, with warmth hovering around 64 degrees. A gentle west-southwest breeze dances through the city, caressing the skin at a brisk 14 mph, while occasional gusts remind you of the ocean's presence. Shadows stretch gracefully as the day begins to transition, lending the scene a calming beauty. 

As daylight gives way to twilight, expect the skies to draw a blanket of clouds, hinting at a slight chance of drizzle later in the night. With temperatures cooling to a cozy 54 degrees, dressing in layers will be prudent; perhaps a light jacket to fend off the evening chill, yet casual enough for a stroll through the streets. The marine layer may linger near the water’s edge but seems less ominous today than in times past, making outdoor pursuits appealing. Whether you wander into a local café for a warm drink or explore the charm of a nearby park, the evening promises comfort wrapped in the elegance of an unwinding city, glowing softly in the fading light.
